---

## Error Tracking

**Components:**
- [ ] Error Detection
- [ ] Error Logging
- [ ] Error Resolution

**Validation:**
1. Error Handling
   - [ ] Error detection working
   - [ ] Proper logging
   - [ ] Resolution tracking

2. Integration
   - [ ] Error propagation
   - [ ] System recovery
   - [ ] Documentation updates

**Success Criteria:**
- [ ] Errors properly detected
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] System recovers properly
